card.name: Imaryll, Elfhame Elite
card.text: Whenever Imaryll, Elfhame Elite attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of other Elves you control.You may have Imaryll assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Maeve, Insidious Singer
card.text: {2}{U}: Goad target creature. Whenever that creature attacks one of your opponents this turn, you draw a card. (A goaded creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able, until your next turn.)

card.name: Nogi, Draco-Zealot
card.text: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.Whenever Nogi, Draco-Zealot attacks, if you control three or more Dragons, until end of turn, Nogi becomes a Dragon with base power and toughness 5/5 and gains flying.

card.name: Vogar, Necropolis Tyrant
card.text: MenaceWhenever another creature dies during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Vogar, Necropolis Tyrant.When Vogar dies, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Zamriel, Seraph of Steel
card.text: FlyingAs long as it's your turn, equipped creatures you control have indestructible.

card.name: Blood for the Blood God!
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature that died this turn.Discard your hand, then draw eight cards. Blood for the Blood God! deals 8 damage to each opponent. Exile Blood for the Blood God!.

card.name: Fabricate
card.text: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
